newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Danzas Swiss unit executive leaves.
newsitem.headline: Danzas Swiss unit executive leaves.

text.p: Freight forewarding group Danzas AG said Martin Rudolf, head of Eurocargo operations in Switzerland, would leave the group as of August 31.
A Danzas statement said Rudolf was stepping down as head of Eurocargo Switzerland and country representative for Switzerland.
The statement said Rudolf was leaving "by mutual agreement" with Danzas. It thanked him for six years of service.
Until a successor is found, Rudolf's place as head of Eurocargo switzerland will be temporarily staffed by Christoph Handschin. -- Zurich Newsroom, +41-1-631 7340
